reviewText: I so enjoying watching Criss Angel (Mindfreak) He has learned his craft so well. He is a joy to watch, keep you on edge of your seat watching. He is amazing. I have his 3 seasons that are on DVD too and they are totally awesome!
The only thing that really impressed me was the last stunt. He has been known to set up the people and everything else but I gave a three star rating just for the last one.
This was a great gift for the family. The things he can do just left us speechless. Great work!!! (But not for the faint of heart)...:)

It was incorrectly stated that this was a waste of money is you owned Season 1. For those that want three episodes that are NOT included in Season 1, then it is worth getting. This was taped during Season 1, and they were left out of the Season 1 DVD package. It includes an hour-long Halloween Special and two half hour specials of highlighting the season. In those episodes were deleted footage that didn't make it previously into the shows for Season 1, as well as an extended two demonstrations that had to be shortened. Criss commentates in between the clips, and it is definitely a must for anyone who enjoyed the first season. Written 1/9/2010. Diane Trautweiler.Criss Angel Mindfreak - Halloween Special
Another great series for Chriss Angel.  Get yours now and you will not be dissapointed.
This is a pretty good one. Once again the things he does are really amazing and unbelievable. That is a definite yes if you like magic.
Love it
Not in the condition expected. The case is kind of broken, I haven't been able to watch the DVD yet.

Criss Angel is an amazing illusionist and this special is really great.  I got this for my mom for Christmas and she absolutely loves it!  I would highly recommend all of his specials for anyone who enjoys this type of entertainment.

Chris Angel never ceases to please. His macabre look at magic is compelling. I would have liked more performances from Chris and less documentary on where he grew up. A nice visit to the Magic Castle for those who wonder what it is like inside.
This book is so awasome so far. I am still rading it, But I would recomend this to any Criss Angel fan.
criss angel is so awesome my husband is into all the magic stuff and just finds criss to be amazing so i figured y not get his this for his birthday.. great product.. thanks
This is a halloween special of Chris Angel. Although it isn't as long as I was hoping, it delivers an entertaining experience.
this is on the first season of criss angel so why waste ur money on this dvd--- just get the season 1 and 2

I think that Criss Angel is the best illusionist out there. I recieved this video right at Halloween time and it was the perfect video to set a great HALLOWEEN  mood. It has a lot of great tricks and illusions as well as some bonus material. Criss Angel Rocks!!!
Anyone who likes Criss Angel will like this. If your looking for something scary, this isn't it. But it does have some good clips from his shows and other good clips.
My daughter loves it!
Good product. NO complaints. Very satisfied. Thank you. Simple as that.
if you like magic, you will like his special.
This Criss Angel show where episode I should say is real good I got all this season
